content: materials - 3 skeins of purl soho s good wool 1 100% undyed andean highland wool each skein is 383 yards/ 100 grams approximately 890 yards required we used the color walking stick we used just 12 grams of our third skein so if you want to buy two instead you can expect your scarf to be about 67 inches long - us 6 4mm straight or circular needles 2 gauge 32 stitches and 26 row = 4 inches in 2 x 2 rib stitch size finished dimensions approximately 10¾ inches wide x 71 inches 1 https //www purlsoho com/good-wool html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796_23802
